summary: It\'s tough out in Tamriel, so why not stock up on a bunch of Ebony wares?
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION
=====================

This mod REPLACES all the Ebony wares in the game to make them a little more... Powerful. By powerful, I mean overpowered. Right now, damages and values for the Ebony armours and weapons are through the roof! This is my first mod using the Creation Kit, and I hope y\'all like it!

INSTALLATION
=====================

1. Extract the .ESP file from the .ZIP file and place it in the Data folder within the Skyrim directory.
2. Open TES V: Skyrim and go into DATA FILES and check my .ESP.
3. Happy Ebony hunting!

Sorry for no images, the Nexus image file upload limit is to small for the kinds of images I want to upload. :/
author: 3VegasModder343
